channel.title: CVE Feed for Bitdefender -- Bitdefender Engines
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bitdefender -- Bitdefender Engines

item.title: CVE-2020-8109|2024-09-17T02:27:57.606Z -- bitdefender -- bitdefender%20engines
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in the ace.xmd parser that results from a lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can result in a write past the end of an allocated buffer. This can result in denial-of-service. This issue affects: Bitdefender Engines version 7.84892 and prior versions.
